tutorials.title: Introduction to the workshop
tutorials.description: This is an introduction to the workshop, the topic of deepfake and the faceswap application.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of the steps to register a free tier account on OCI.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create SSH keys
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional steps to create SSH keys that you will need to connect to your compute instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Provision GPU instance
tutorials.description: This lab you through the required and optional steps to launch a GPU instance on OCI .

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Set up and access through VNC
tutorials.description: This lab will walk through the required steps to set up and access your Ubuntu instance through a VNC client (here: TigerVNC).

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Install Faceswap
tutorials.description: This lab will walk through the required and optional steps to install Faceswap on your compute instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Run Faceswap
tutorials.description: This lab will walk through the required and optional steps to run Faceswap on your compute instance (terminal and GUI).

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
